transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello ha madam hello.

Executive: Hello aawaz aa rahi hai.

Customer: Haan sir Vuraj Consultancy se Rachit baat kar raha hun main.

Executive: Kahan se sir?

Customer: Vuraj Consultancy se.

Executive: Okay bataiye sir.

Customer: Haan sir aapke package ke bare mein jaanna tha aur kya kaise lead aati hai kaise hum us par work kar sakte hain. Main service provide karta hun GST accounting export documentation export license wagera ki.

Executive: Yes sir.

Executive: To aap beta mere ko aap whatsapp pe high bej dijiye main abhi aaj ek kya hai aaj hamara off hai to hum office mein nahi hai kal pahunch ke main karta hun aapko.

Customer: Hmm okay theek hai aapka whatsapp number yahi rahega?

Executive: Ye number nahi aap note kar lijiye.

Customer: Hmm ek second.

Customer: Haan bataiye sir.

Executive: 7455

Customer: 7455

Executive: Haan hmm hmm 06

Customer: 06

Executive: 54

Customer: 54

Executive: 31

Customer: 21

Executive: 3131 last mein 31.

Executive: 31 okay ha.

Executive: Theek hai aap mere ko us pe bej dijiye main ek baar kal check karke aapko bata dunga kyuki abhi system nahi hai na mere paas.

Customer: Okay sir package ke bare mein jaanna tha aur leads kitni aa sakti hai approx jaan sakta hun. Abhi aapki kaun si chal raha hai package?

Customer: Package chal nahi raha hai new fresh.

Customer: Nahi banana hai package package lena hai chal nahi raha hai.

Executive: Achha abhi aapka package chal nahi raha hai.

Customer: Haan lena hai package.

Executive: To aapko ye mera number kisne diya?

Customer: Maine online search kiya.

Executive: Achha online search kiya aapne IndiaMART.

Customer: Haan IndiaMART se.

Executive: Okay okay okay. Achha achha to aapko kya GST wagera ka usme dekhiye aap jo hamara basic package start hota hai wo hai abhi 32 plus GST ya 37000 se start hai theek hai.

Executive: Aur isme aapko milegi sir 17 by lead milti hai per week yani ki 10 by lead hafte pe aur ek milti hai per day.

Customer: Achha.

Executive: Ek lead per day.

Customer: Haan ek lead per day aur 10 milti hai hafte pe matlab extra to wo total weekly ho gayi 17 aapke.

Customer: Ek week mein 17 milti hai.

Executive: Haan.

Executive: Haan aur wo confirm milti bhi hai.

Customer: Haan bilkul confirm milti hai.

Customer: Achha main ki main aisa manu ki 60 se 70 ke beech mein ho jati hai confirm aisa.

Executive: Nahi nahi nahi dekhiye by lead ka matlab kya hai ki by lead mein jaise kisi ne aapki demand dali GST ki theek hai ha.

Executive: Ki mere ko GST banwani hai ya kuch bhi to aapka matlab aapke hum wo IndiaMART pe hum log post karte hain fir aapke paas wo jayega jaise aap GST mein kam karte hain to us bande ka matlab contact aapke paas bhi jayega agar aap usse baat karte hain.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Haan to aapke alawa aur bhi panch log char log rahenge jo usse baat karenge jisse uski deal mature ho jayegi usse ho jayega. Char log ki panch log total kitne ek lead total kitne logo ke paas jati hai sir?

Executive: Ek lead total panch logo ke paas jati hai.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Ek lead panch logo ke paas gayi ab jiski buyer pe deal ho gayi uski deal ho gayi fir yahi hai ke aap dusri lead jab aayegi ya inquiry se calls bhi aati hai jaise direct aapka website matlab dekh ke aapka catalog direct inquiry calls bhi aati hai aapke paas.

Customer: Haan okay.

Executive: Haan to dekhiye conversion ka to ye hai

Customer: Conversion rate ka to mushkil se 5% rehta hai wo main jaanta hun.

Executive: Haan haan haan 5% hi rehta hoga ha.

Executive: Bilkul kyuki aap dekhiye na panch char logo pe ha bataiye ha.

Customer: Haan main aisa bol raha hun ki mahine mein to kitni confirm man sake ki itni to aati hai aisa.

Executive: Dekhiye lead aapki main kal ek baar system pe baithunga to aapko GST ki aur aapka jo jo kam rahega na mere ko whatsapp kar dena to main usme aapko ye check karke bataunga ki IndiaMART pe pure saal mein is cheez ki kitni demand aa rahi hai.

Executive: Theek hai okay.

Executive: Haan aur us demand ke hisab se aapka kya kya aapke competition rahega aur kitne ka aapko lagbhag ek average sa main de dunga kal.

Executive: Theek hai okay theek hai ha aap mere ko whatsapp pe bej dijiyega number main karta hun okay okay main high bej raha hun main apni detail thodi bahut bej deta hun theek hai sir theek hai okay okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about IndiaMART packages.

- Wants to know how many leads can be expected.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about basic package.

- Executive explained lead distribution process.

- Executive offered to check demand and competition.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details on WhatsApp.

- Executive will check and provide details tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, gst, package
